name: JumpHead: Battle4Fun!
description:
Play with your friends in hilarious limitless games to show who's the real "Jump Champion"! Your goal is clear: jump on as many heads as possible to earn points !

Your weight is not your only weapon to fight your opponents. You can use a ridiculous but deadly arsenal to prove them your supremacy !

Participate in crazy gameplay and add a new twist to your fights. Become addicted to selfies and win by jumping into the frame every time a photo is taken; or battle in a place where the time is completely broken !
